title: Leading life insurance companies in the U.S. 2018 , by assets
yAxis: Total assets in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurers in the x axis and Total assets in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Total assets in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurers Prudential Financial and lowest at Insurers Guardian.
The difference of Total assets in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurers is 502.32.

max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Insurers, and Total assets in billion U.S. dollars in each Insurers on the y axis.
The Total assets in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurers Prudential Financial and lowest at Insurers Guardian.
Insurers MetLife Inc. has the second highest value for Total assets in billion U.S. dollars.
The highest Insurers Prudential Financial has 502.32 more Total assets in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Insurers Guardian.
The Insurers Prudential Financial has the highest Total assets in billion U.S. dollars, followed by MetLife Inc., and New York Life. Down to the Insurers Guardian which is the lowest.
The Insurers Guardian has 2.77 times less Total assets in billion U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Insurerss, we get total 5220.66.
